messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Oh really? I take this as a CHALLANGE CAPTAIN JACK GREY!!!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you see centcom, USE LETHALS

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: EVERYONE GET GUNS, ARM YOURSELF TO THE TEETH, AI OPEN DOORS TO ARMORY

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Security Officer Donkin. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Thisss isss officer Donkssson, centcom asssked me to evac before i blow thisss ssshithole, ssso make your way to the damn ERT ssshuttle, that isss all
